Horseshoe Point Villa

descriptions.description: Horseshoe Point Mediterranean Villa. Set within large 2,400+ sq.m landscaped gardens, this 3-bedroom Spanish style Villa looks amazing. Right at the front of the property is a freeform private swimming pool, and a large, covered poolside deck terrace and bar, where you can sit and relax in private, or entertain friends and family with cocktails, sangria, and a BBQ sizzling! Within the very large grounds is a 2-car garage, with electric shutters, guest studio accommodation, with their own kitchen and bathroom, plus an enclosed Pagoda which has a variety of purposes. As you step inside this 350 sq.m home, your eyes are immediately drawn upwards to the 6-metre-high ceilings, with exposed beams. As well as being a dramatic feature of the home it serves the purpose of keeping the whole property cool. And it really does. Walk barefoot on the terracotta tiling and your feet will remain cool throughout the house. There is a spacious Western kitchen that is open to the dining area, and the addition of a pantry, or laundry room beside really is convenient. There is also another separate storage room within the house, which really helps keep the home clutter free. The master bedroom has access out onto the poolside terrace, perfect for that morning swim. It also features a walk-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom with ‘his & hers’ hand basins and a Jacuzzi bathtub. Each of the other 2 bedrooms also have access out onto the terrace. Overall, the house, and space around the property is very impressive, and with a few little touches here and there, would be totally transformed into a real ‘showstopper’!

The new Bangkok-Pattaya motorway is only 2 kilometers from here. This would make a great beachside development.

This plot can be ready for housing development, or for industrial usage. Mabprachan Lake is just 10 minutes from here.

Pattaya Height Condominium

descriptions.description: Pattaya Height Condominium. Positioned just 50 metres from Jomtien Beach, this makes it an ideal location for many. From here you can enjoy a stroll along the shaded pathways, or chill and take a rest in a wide selection of cafés, restaurants and bars. Public transport also passes by here, so you can ‘hop on’ to go further south along the beach, or travel in the opposite direction and arrive in Downtown Pattaya within 10 minutes. The building is very presentable, and has an elevated communal swimming pool, onsite restaurant and excellent security

descriptions.description: The Residence Jomtien Beach. Just five minutes from Jomtien’s beaches yet hidden away in a nice quiet area. This is a cozy and private, small low-rise building with only 68 units. The swimming pool is a main feature as it is both large and unique. At the far end of the pool is a fully equipped poolside gymnasium. This is a great corner unit, west facing, on the 3rd floor of the building overlooking the whole pool. It is very rare to find such a generous (85sq.m) one bedroom unit these days, as properties continue to get smaller and smaller! With the large proportions, is easily fits the big leather sofa, 65″ wall mounted flat screen TV and built in entertainment unit, comfortable king size bed and enough storage space for a couple to live comfortably. The bathroom is spacious with a walk in shower with glass partition and hand basin with under storage and full size vanity mirror Now we talk about the oversized ‘double balcony’. It boasts enough room to eat dinner on, and in the evenings the whole pool area is illuminated with LED lighting and is such a terrific place to be. Viewing over the gardens and pool make this place feel like a tropical resort. Owned in Company Name. All taxes and transfers shall be split 50/50 between buyer and seller. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or send us an Email at info@old.cornerstone.co.th for more details or to arrange a viewing

descriptions.description: Serenity Villas. A brand new housing project which will start construction in December 2020 and will be totally finished by the end of 2022. These new homes are a modern contemporary design with a 2 storey layout. Each property sits within their own private gardens, and each enjoys a nice private swimming pool and large outdoor terrace. The construction will be of top quality, with the use of high-end materials to finish each home. All common utilities will be underground, have wide access roads and the entrance will be secured by modern access systems. There are 26 houses in total: 14 x 3 bedroom + 4 bathroom. Prices starting from 13,950,000 Thai Baht 12 x 4 bedroom + 5 bathroom. Prices starting from 19,950,000 Thai Baht Land plots range from between 240 sq.m up to 597 sq.m Each house follows a modern tropical design concept, gives each bedroom a private en-suite bathroom and include high quality built-in/walk-in wardrobes and a modern hi-gloss European kitchen with large split-level island. There will be 2 x upstairs balconies and a “floating” style staircase which will be lit by LED lighting. The air conditioners will also be very ECO friendly with inverter design. Located less than 1 kilometer from Jomtien Beach this will be an idyllic setting, with lots of convenience for shopping, dining and even as a location hub with U-Tapao airport just 25 kms away and the Suvarnabhumi International airport reachable within 1 hour. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate to receive a full E-Brochure and latest up to date price list. info@ocornerstone.co.th or call 038411250

There is a fully covered car-park and reception office on the ground floor. A large swimming pool and library is on the 2nd floor. descriptions.description: A 2 Rai plot set just off Horseshoe Point, and just 2 kilometres from Mabprachan Reservoir. This has become the "hot spot" for buyers looking to build their own homes, in a location surrounded by other impressive private properties. The land plot has recently been cleared and leveled, so could be built on relatively quickly. All land prices in the area are rising rapidly due to Thai buyers seeking a break from Bangkok, and foreigners who arrive for business, and choose Pattaya for the International schools and excellent ex-pat community. Bangkok Pattaya Motorway, Highway 36 & Highway 331 are accessible within 10 minutes. Regent International School, Rugby International, Tara Pattana, and Hastings are all within 10-15 minutes. St Andrews, and ISE International are roughly 25 minutes away. This area is surrounded by 4 International golf courses (Siam Country Club has 4 courses), plus 'at least' another 10 courses are less than 20 kilometres drive. descriptions.description: Nam Talay Condominium. From this 12th floor corner unit, every room enjoys fabulous sea, sunset, mountain and city views. This impressive 51sq.m corner unit is set within a complex completed in 2017. The condo is located at the Southern end of Jomtien Beach, in an area called Na Jomtien. The building is just 200 metres from the beach, and is a nice short walk. The current owner completely renovated the whole unit to include: a built in dishwasher under the counter top of the European fitted kitchen, a built in washing machine below the bathroom counter tops, a huge 60” TV in the living room, a telescopic television you can watch in bed and also on the balcony, new LED lights throughout, and a keyless digital front door. Nam Talay condo has some great facilities to enjoy. A massive communal swimming pool dominates the central area, with mature trees and grass. On the rooftop, this space has been decked with artificial grass, and has lots of seating so everybody can enjoy the amazing views and sea breeze. Na Jomtien is a quieter part of Jomtien Beach, yet has sufficient shops, restaurants and beach bars. A taxi can get you to the busier bar areas within 5 minutes, plus there are water parks, golf courses and other attractions just 20 minutes away. The property is owned in Company Name, which means that the new buyer will take over the company directorship shares at a very minimal cost. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or send us an Email at info@cornerstone.co.th for more details or to arrange a viewing

descriptions.description: The unit located on the 4th floor with lovely pool and surrounding view. You have 3 bedrooms each with bed, wardrobe, air condition, and ceiling fans. Two of them have direct access to the balcony. Spacious open plan living come with fully fitted Western style kitchen, dining table for 4, and living area leads out to balcony with plenty of space for enjoying views and entertaining as well. The condo is sold fully furnished as shown in pictures. Nordic Residence is located in Pratumnak Soi 4, a quiet area between Jomtien and Pattaya. The building is close to 7-eleven, golf course, massage, restaurants and the beach. There are covered parking, reception, and great common swimming pool. descriptions.description: Palm Oasis. This is a stunning, contemporary, detached 2 bedroom two bathroom Villa with a plunge pool and sun terrace which both offer complete privacy. The property is fully fitted and furnished to a very high standard and is ready to move in. Both of the king size bedrooms are on-suite and have built in furniture including matching beds wardrobes and feature headboards with down lights. The kitchen is white high gloss with black granite worktops and includes all built in white goods and a large fridge. Bathrooms are black and grey stone with rain pan and hand showers and the vanity units are topped with black granite and have built in cupboards beneath The master bedroom and living room both step out onto a terrace and plunge pool which boasts complete privacy as does the large second floor sun deck Palm Oasis is conveniently situated in the heart of Jomtien and has become the most sought after project due to its modern design and beautifully kept large green communal areas The property is ready to transfer with full title to its new owner

descriptions.description: Green Field Villa 1. This has long been regarded as one of the best villa projects in the whole of East Pattaya. Located just off Siam Country Club Road, you have a good choice of local Thai markets, and plenty of Thai and European restaurants and bars. Access onto the Bangkok – Pattaya motorway is just a few hundred metres away which opens up the whole of the Eastern Seaboard and all of the International schools are quick to reach. With pleasant, but diligent security guards at the entrance, to the wide landscaped roads throughout the village, the place feels homely and safe. There is a nice common area in the central of the village which has a generous grassed playpark, a long communal swimming pool, poolside gymnasium and even a friendly bar and seating area to entertain family and friends. This 3-bedroom single storey home boasts its own private swimming pool which sets it apart from many other homes in the village. The whole house has been maintained to a very high level always, and has just received a fresh make-over so it is in perfect condition. There is a main living area with a smaller conservatory beside. The Western kitchen features high and low fitted cabinets and built in appliances. The large master bedroom has a walk-in wardrobe and luxury bathroom with separate rain shower and bathtub. The slightly smaller 2nd bedroom also boats an en-suite bathroom. The 3rd bedroom is positioned beside the guest bathroom which has 2 doors giving access form the bedroom or living room. All rooms are fully furnished and fully air conditioned. Owned in Thai Name. All taxes and transfers shall be split 50/50 between buyer and seller. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or send us an Email at info@old.cornerstone.co.th for more details or to arrange a viewing

descriptions.description: Just a few minutes from the entrance to Phoenix Gold Golf Course you will find this quiet and private villa, set off of a newly surfaced wide main road. With a generous 300 Wah² (1,200 sq.m) of land the house is very private and has large landscaped gardens and a private pool at the rear of the house. The home has been very well maintained, and regularly repainted. With the house set back from the entrance, it reveals itself behind small flower beds. There is plenty of car parking available. There are a couple of ways to enter the house – through the covered archways into the living room, or around the side of the house to enter directly into the kitchen (perfect for when you’ve been grocery shopping). Overall the house has 3 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms. The master bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom, a walk through wardrobe and access out into the gardens and pool. Beyond the living room is a lovely dining room, and fully equipped Western kitchen. At the rear of the house is a shaded seating area beside the private swimming pool. The home has free water supplied into the house via a 75m deep bore hole, and the garden is watered from another shallower water well.

Pratumnak Hill is central to both Jomtien and Downtown Pattaya, and is recognised as a far quieter residential part of the city. Cosy Beach has a small high street that runs through the area, and caters for all local residents. By day you can enjoy a choice of massage and spa’s, and in the evening there are a good selection of restaurants & bars to unwind. This 39 square metre studio apartment has a very practical layout and features a great use of space. It is positioned on the 19th floor of the tower with Pattaya City bay and sea-views. It is sold fully equipped with a Euro kitchen, built in furniture and fitted bathroom. The Cliff Condominium has a 30 metre communal swimming pool, a poolside gymnasium and a separate children’s pool and water slides. titles.title: D Space Pattaya

descriptions.description: D-Space Pattaya. D-Space Pattaya takes its inspiration from modern architecture. The 2 storey homes really stand out with their unique design. Influenced by using modern shapes with emphasis on maximizing space and connecting the interior to the green outdoor areas around the house. The main stand out feature of these houses is the six meters double height living room that creates a feeling of space and naturally cools the room. A brand-new village being constructed in Huay Yai, East Pattaya. They are building 16 high quality private homes that will be set within a secure landscaped environment. The developers have also put a priority to providing each home, and the whole village with energy efficient design features:Roof installation under the roof. For every house in the project, there is a heat, cold and anti-leak insulation system that offers excellent protection from heat coming in through the roof, and traps and retains all the cold air from your air conditioners inside the home.The house saves energy by using an environmentally-friendly innovation. It has a linear design positioned to receive wind from the northern and southern directions, so the house is cool year-round.Using natural light from the installation of skylights will let in ‘indirect’ sunlight which will illuminate the interior to be brighter so that there is no need to turn any lights on during the daytime.All light bulbs in the house are LED that dramatically reduces monthly electricity cost.Throughout the village are Eco SMART solar cell street lights which cut costs for common fees shared by each owner. They are bright, attractive, inexpensive and turn on and off automatically without wires or electricity costs. As well as a very unique & luxurious living room, these 2 storey houses provide owners with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a fitted Western kitchen ‘plus’ an outdoor Thai kitchen and a private swimming pool (2.5m x 6m) in the landscaped garden. The master bedroom boasts a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. There is a SMART Home system, fitted as standard in all houses. This technology can be controlled by your tablet, or smart phone and is used to control many things inside the house. For example, you can set the light to automatically turn on and off when you enter/exit the house, set a timer for the air conditioner, or view the CCTV security footage inside the house, even when you are not in the house. On the front door is a digital door lock with passcode or thumb-print access. At the front of the property is a car-port large enough for 2 vehicles, which is secured by a Häfele electric roller shutter. Within this area is also aa built in storage area that offers a convenient place to store all DIY items, or for sports gear and equipment. TYPE A Villa: 57.44wah² – 61.43wah² – Prices starting from 6,900,000 THBTYPE B Villa: 58.68wah² – 69.46wah² – Prices starting from 7,250,000 THB Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing – Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th Map

descriptions.description: The Axis Condominium. Set right on the top of Pratumnak/Thappraya Hill, this high rise tower has a really accessible location for Pattaya City, Jomtien and Pratumnak Beaches. There are many shops and restaurants along the main road outside too. The Axis Condominium offers multi storey car and motorbike parking for the whole project as well as an elevated sea-view communal swimming pool and gymnasium. This particular unit is located on the 5th floor, and offers a total of 56 sq.m living space (including balcony). The smart design creates a spacious 2 bedroom property which is very homely. There is a separate fitted kitchen with a built-in oven and it also has a washing machine. This village is very attractive to families as it offers a nice clean and quiet place to live, plus real convenience for those who need to be close to the International schools in the area, and within easy reach of the Eastern Seaboard. Available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing - Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Andromeda Condominium Pattaya

descriptions.description: Andromeda Condominium. Andromeda will boast a total of 36 floors with just 216 exclusive units inside. It is going to be located on Pratumnak Hill this is one of the most sought-after neighborhoods to live, Pratumnak now offers an abundance of desired amenities. 2 bedroom - Every two-bedroom unit feels like an estate in the sky, with spacious floor plans and quality construction using premium materials and fittings. Each unit offers the absolute finest 270°sea view that Pratumnak area has to offer, highlighted by soaring floor-to-ceiling windows. Perfect for families or couples seeking a residence to spend more time in paradise. Andromeda is designed for relaxation, and includes a wealth of facilities that allow residents to fully enjoy leisure times. In the sky lounge and library, curl up with a novel you have been meaning to finish, and luxuriate on the resort-style sofa beds. There is also a stocked entertainment room equipped for fun for the whole family. After a long day or a strenuous workout, Andromeda residents can unwind in the Jacuzzi and panoramic spa pool while enjoying a picture-perfect view. Located on the 25th floor, the infinity-view Sky Pool is a lovely space for swimming laps or splashing around, with a majestic open sea view rivaling five-star resorts. The open deck is perfect for sunbathing and admiring a view like no other. The fully-equipped, climate-controlled fitness center offers residents commercial-grade machines and equipment, free weights and activity spaces to break a healthy sweat and maintain your beach-ready physique. Andromeda Condominium is the latest project from the Apus Development Group, one of the premier real estate developers in Pattaya. With successful project launches, such as Apus Condominium, Cetus Luxury Tower and Del Mare Seaside Highrise, Apus Development has built a track record of trustworthy results and reliable service for residents over the past 10 years. From their first low-rise buildings, to modern high-rise landmarks, the hallmarks of Apus Development are selecting exceptional locations and designing spaces that maximize quality of living using the highest-grade materials. Nearby to Andromeda is the Royal Varuna Yacht Club, Royal Cliff and Inter-Continental hotel complexes. From here it is possible to take a leisurely stroll along one of the finest beaches, or a short journey to a wealth of shopping and dining options, offering hip ambience and culinary flair that rivals even the chicest corners of Bangkok, but with the addition here of tranquil sea views and a cool gentle breeze. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, check availability or to make an appointment

Ruamchok Condo View

descriptions.description: Ruamchock Condo. This is a conveniently located low-rise condominium, just 50 metres from Pratumnak Beach. All residents enjoy the advantage of the larger living spaces in the building. This 80sqm one-bedroom apartment is set on the 4th floor of the building and offers a large open plan living space with fitted kitchen along 1 wall. The bedroom is spacious with an en-suite bathroom, plus there is a modern tiled guest bathroom as well as storage rooms and a good-sized balcony. The condominium provides a lovely communal swimming pool with sun chairs, and well-kept landscaped gardens. Pratumnak Hill is a nice quiet beach area and has a good choice of quieter bars and restaurants. The beach here is clean and has views out to Koh Larn island. The footpath winds its way along the beach and comes out at the start of Jomtien Beach road. Available for rent on a long term 12-month basis with a 2-month security deposit. titles.title: Baan Suan Roong Rod

descriptions.description: Located in Naklua, North Pattaya, this 2 storey property is a perfect City Centre home. This village is access directly from Naklua Road which gives immediate routes to Pattaya Beach and all of the shopping malls in the area. The stunning Wongamat Beach, with its palm tree lined pathways and gorgeous golden sand is just 5 minutes away. Available for rent, this 3-bedroom house has a small front garden, and space for off road car parking. Inside, the open plan ground floor features the living room, European kitchen and guest bathroom. Upstairs are all 3 bedrooms, with all of them having en-suite bathrooms. The front master bedroom has a private covered terrace. Available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Green View Villas

descriptions.description: Green View Villa. This exclusive 3 storey villa stands inside the Phoenix Gold Golf Course, which is just 20 minutes out from the city centre and Jomtien beaches. This is a really quiet setting with plenty of peace and quiet. From the 4rd floor rooftop you can get full views over the whole golf course. Boasting a 4-bedroom, 5-bathroom layout, this luxury home has all the ‘mod-cons’ that such a home deserves, such as a designer Western kitchen with built-in appliances, full drop sliding doors and large balconies, modern furniture and LED lighting inside & out. The house is set upon a 200 wah² (800sqm) landscaped sloping garden, and has a long private swimming pool. All residents can have full use of the Phoenix Gold Golf Course communal facilities which include a huge swimming pool, tennis courts. Inside the club house is a restaurant and bar, and a pro golf shop. It is available to buy in Company Name with the low cost taxes split on a 50/50 basis. Also available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view.

titles.title: Green View Villas

descriptions.description: Green View Villa. Located right inside the Phoenix Gold Golf Course, this modern contemporary 3 storey detached villa boasts great views of the golf course and surrounding nature. All residents enjoy full use of the Phoenix Gold Golf Course communal facilities which include a tennis court, huge swimming pool, and onsite clubhouse which has a restaurant and bar, driving range and a pro golf shop. Set upon a large 200 wah² (800sqm) landscaped land plot, this prime property boasts an impressive 4-bedroom, 5-bathroom layout. All throughout the house are modern touches which make the property stand-out against the rest. From simple LED mood lighting, high quality furnishings, to full sliding glass doors which open the house out onto the wrap around terraces, a high gloss designer western kitchen, and stunning private swimming pool. On the top of the building is a full rooftop terrace with covered jacuzzi tub and potted gardens that overlook the whole golf course. It is available to buy in Company Name with the low-cost taxes split on a 50/50 basis. Also available for rent on a long term 12-month basis with a 2-month security deposit. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.

Platinum Suites Condominiums

descriptions.description: Platinum Suites is Located on Thepprasit Rd about 600 metres from the start of Jomtien and Thappraya Rd. On your doorstep you have access to public transport and the big night market, petrol stations, grocery markets and supermarkets, all within 5 minutes from the condominium The unit has a large 62 sqm of living area and comes fully furnished, including a European kitchen, air con and large balcony. Onsite facilities include 24-hour security, a huge communal swimming pool, fitness centre, cafe or coffee shop and has key card entry throughout each building. Owned freehold in foreign name. The owner has agreed for the land office fees to be split 50/50 between buyer and seller. Please contact your friendly Cornerstone Real Estate team for more information on 038 411250 or info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Jomtien Hill's Resort

descriptions.description: Jomtien Hills Condominium. Located on Pratumnak Hill which has its own amazing beach, and is just a 5-minute journey to be in the vibrant city of Pattaya, or the slightly slower paced beaches of Jomtien. The condominium offers a nice central communal swimming pool, underground car & motorbike parking and 24-hour security. This 1-bedroom condo is located on the 4th floor of the building and has been combined from 2 side-by-side units. Fully converted and renovated it offers a total of 80 sqm’s with a large living room and fitted Western kitchen, plus a fully separated bedroom and bathroom. The condo is for sale, or for rent fully furnished and fully air conditioned. Owned in Foreign Name (freehold) title. The seller shall split all taxes & transfer fees on a 50/50 basis with the buyer. It is available for rent on a long term 12-month agreement with a 2-month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing - Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Chomtalay Resort

descriptions.description: Chomtalay Condo Jomtien. This 14-floor beachfront condo sits at the southern end of Jomtien beach and offers all residents a sea view pool and direct access to the beach. Set high up on the 9th floor of the building, this 2-bedroom corner unit has some incredible views of the water, and the illuminations of Jomtien beach in the evenings. Overall this unit has a 126sqm floor plan. This includes the sea view balconies and all internal space. The owner has furnished the place well and the property is bright and welcoming. Being a corner unit, each room has windows for natural light. A fitted Western kitchen is in one corner of the room with built in appliances and fitted ‘high and low’ cabinets. On the large sea view balcony is a washing machine, BBQ area and a small outdoor kitchen. This really is a rare opportunity to buy and own a foreign name (freehold) condominium is a prime beachfront condominium for an aggressively priced property! Be quick to view. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing - Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

descriptions.description: The Cliff Condominium. This is a fantastic high-rise tower located on Cozy Beach, which is part of Pratumnak Hill. Cozy Beach is an amazingly picturesque quiet sandy bay, with clean waters and views across to Koh Larn Island. Pratumnak Hill is the hilltop area that scan be seen from Pattaya Bay, where the Pattaya City illuminated sign is. This headland separates Pattaya City from the 5 kilometre stretch of Jomtien Beach. Pratumnak Hill actually has 3 very nice beaches of its own. In Cosy Beach you will find a small high street which is full of some great restaurants, high end spa treatments and beauty care, plus the usual convenience stores for all the day to day grocery shopping. This desirable 71 sq. metre corner unit is located on the 4th floor of the tower and has two balconies! One is off from the living room, and the 2nd wraps around the master bedroom. The property is sold fully furnished, and also fully equipped with a nice Euro kitchen with built in oven and fridge freezer, a nice bathroom which has a separate bathtub and rain shower. This really is an impressive condo unit for the price!! The Cliff Condominium boasts some great communal facilities, such as a long communal swimming pool, children’s water slides and a poolside gymnasium. The condo is owned in Company Name so anyone keeping this ownership will have very low-cost transfer fees. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate via Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call the office on +6638411250 for further details, or to arrange a viewing.

Uraiwan Town
Laguna Beach Resort 3 - The Maldives

descriptions.description: Laguna Beach Resort 3 – Maldives. This large low-rise resort style project was completed in 2018 and offers residents a unique experience with its massive multi level central pools, poolside gymnasium, waterfalls and plenty of small sun deck areas so that its possible to find some privacy. This 23sqm studio unit is located on the top floor (8th floor) and has views over Jomtien. The property comes fully furnished, plus has air conditioning, a practical Euro kitchen and equipped bathroom. It is located around 5 minutes from Jomtien Beach and the busier areas with plenty of choice of restaurants & bars to enjoy. Along Jomtien Beach it’s possible to play various water sports, or stroll along the beachfront pathways. The property is brand new and never been lived in. It is owned in Thai Name, the unit is ready to transfer from the developer. titles.title: PKCP Tower

descriptions.description: Pattaya Klang Centerpoint Condo. This oversized 60sqm studio unit is positioned on a high floor (12th) of this city building and has some great views all over Pattaya City. With such a large space the unit feels very spacious and bright. There is a fitted Euro kitchen and a bathroom which has a separate bathtub and shower. The building is well managed and has a large communal swimming pool, a pool view gymnasium, off road parking and 24-hour security. Located along Pattaya 3rd road and beside the huge Big C Extra shopping mall and supermarket. The property is available for long term rental contracts and requires a 2-month security deposit. titles.title: Unicca

descriptions.description: Unicca Condo. Located on South Pattaya road next to the huge Big C supermarket this high-rise condominium offers a practical area for this 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom property. Outside, along the main road are lots of new restaurants, large open-air bars and local businesses. The condo even provides a shuttle bus to Big C upon request. This 2-bed family unit is located high up on the 14th floor of the building and has some impressive city views. The owner says at nighttime, sitting on the balcony and seeing the city lights is very beautiful. Unicca Condo has an elevated communal swimming pool, and fitness room too. The whole apartment has been well furnished, has a European kitchenette and is ready to move in. Owned in Company name this property can be a very cheap transfer. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Na Lanna

descriptions.description: Na Lanna Condominium. This 8 storey low-rise building is located close to North Pattaya road, Sukhumvit and the Motorway access. The building itself is positioned a quiet street, and within walking distance to a great range of indoor or open-air restaurants and bars, also there are plenty of local shops and businesses. From here its possible to get to Terminal 21, Central Festival and Pattaya beach road easily within 5 minutes, or so. Na Lanna condominium provides all residents full use of their gym and a swimming pool. This 6th floor One-bedroom apartment is well appointed and has views of the gardens and pool from its balcony. There is a Euro-style kitchen area and the property comes fully furnished and ready to move in. It can be rented with a minimum 6-month contract and a 2-month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment.

titles.title: Pornthep Garden Ville 6

descriptions.description: Pornthep Garden Ville. This family village has been thoughtfully located close to the Bangkok Pattaya motorway so it offers immediate highway routes through the city and the Eastern Seaboard. The owner of this property has taken very good care of the property and has recently renovated the whole house and also built a sperate guest house to the side. This home sits on one of the largest plots in the village with a 660sqm garden plot. Overall the home offers around 260sqm of living space between the main house and guest house. In total there are 4 spacious bedrooms (2 with en-suite bathroom facilities), so a perfect property for a larger family. The living room is quite large and to the far end is a practical open plan Western kitchen. The outside rear of the house has also seen improvements by covering most of the space this is the place for the water storage tank, hot water heater, washing machine and a space for laundry and storage. Pornthep Garden Ville 6 has a communal swimming pool for all residents to use and 24-hour security guards. Available for rent on a long term 12-month basis with a 2-month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

titles.title: Panalee Banna Village

descriptions.description: Panalee Banna Village. Located in Huay Yai, this ever-expanding area is becoming an Expat “hotspot” amongst working professionals and foreign families. Located close to the Eastern Seaboard and the major international schools yet is just 20-25 minutes out of the city centre and the southern Jomtien beaches. This modern and open style village has excellent security and has a large communal swimming pool, poolside gymnasium and big landscaped gardens for the kids to play in safety. Set on a 520sqm land plot, the 3-bedroom 2-bathroom home is very well furnished and boasts a stylish open plan western kitchen, a master bedroom with en-suite facilities, ECO air conditioning and a private garden. Available to rent with a minimum 12 month contract and a 2 month security deposit. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.

titles.title: Park Royal 3

descriptions.description: Park Royal 3 condo. A larger than average (45 sqm) one bedroom, one-bathroom unit, located on the 6th floor of an 8 storey low-rise condominium. The development provides all residents with plenty of communal facilities such as a central communal pool, with sun deck and small garden, a small rooftop dip pool, and an equipped fitness room It is possible to access the rooftops of both buildings, and relax on their artificial grass gardens and soak up the 360° over Pratumnak Hill and views out over the Gulf of Thailand. There is underground car parking below both buildings, and the elevator goes into this level so it’s possible to go straight up to your room with any shopping. Inside, the apartment has been well fitted out to include a white gloss Western kitchen with ceramic hob and hood. Both rooms have air conditioning and the bedroom has built in wardrobes. The whole property is rented fully furnished. The unit has views to the communal pool below. Pratumnak Beach is just a short walk away, and in the immediate area are convenience stores, a night market and a few bars and restaurants. This is a nice quiet family area. Available for rent on a long term 12-month basis with a 2-month security deposit. For sale in Foreign name ownership and with buyer and seller sharing the taxes and transfer fees. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing – Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Avenue Residence

descriptions.description: The Avenue Condo. This building has stood the test of time, having been around a lot longer than most condominiums that continue to sprout up over the city. As such they are generally bigger than these new condos, which can give you better value for money. Being older it has one of the prime locations in the city, close to Soi Buakhao and 2nd Road. This is perfect for those who want to be able to walk everywhere and take in all that Pattaya has to offer. The beach is 500 metres away, and Central Plaza is less than a kilometer. There are hundreds of bars, coffee shops, restaurants and shops of all kinds within walking distance. The condominium is well organized, comes with underground parking and has a gym, sauna and a swimming pool. On the 8th (top) floor this studio unit is a decent 35m². There is plenty of room as there is a built in wardrobe and a small European kitchen. The unit is fully furnished and has good city views from the balcony. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

titles.title: Atlantis Condo Resort

descriptions.description: Atlantis Condo. This resort style condominium project has been inventive in creating a complex with central swimming pools that resemble a water park. Themed with sunken galleon ships, water cannons, water slides, bridges to span the pools and beautiful tropical landscaping. Located on Jomtien 2nd road it allows easy access to Jomtien Beach, all of the seafront bars and restaurants plus a small high street with a fresh market and local shops, clinic, beauty salon, bank and convenience stores. In total, the ground floor unit has a 72sqm floor space which provides 2 well sized bedrooms & bathrooms, and a spacious living room with double balconies and fitted European kitchen. As well as the incredible lagoon pools the condominium complex provides a poolside gymnasium, children’s playground, WIFI internet inside the lobby spaces, covered car parking and onsite 7/11 mini mart. It is owned in Foreign Name ownership and the taxes and transfer fees will be split 50/50 between buyer and seller. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.

titles.title: Park Royal 3

descriptions.description: Park Royal 3 condo. These two low-rise (8 floor) condominium buildings are located just 600 metres from the beautiful Pratumnak Beach. This beach has an awesome winding pathway that leads under the palm tree lined beach all the way to Jomtien beach. In the middle of the courtyard there is a nice communal pool, sun deck and small garden. On the rooftop of both buildings there is an artificial grassed recreation area where it gives you a full 360° view over Pratumnak Hill and views out over the Gulf of Thailand. Shared with all residents in Building A is a small rooftop dip pool, and an equipped fitness room on the ground floor. There is underground car parking below both buildings, and the elevator goes into this level so it’s possible to go straight up to your room with any shopping. This 7th floor one-bedroom unit has a nice bright feeling when you walk in and it has been well decorated. There are views over Pratumnak Hill from the balcony and bedroom windows. Available for rent on a long term 12-month basis with a 2-month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing - Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Jomtien Complex

descriptions.description: Jomtien Complex. This building is fantastic for offering larger than average (68sqm) studio units all facing Jomtien Beach. From this 12th floor balcony you can get a great view of the Gulf of Thailand and also a nice sea breeze throughout the day and night. The property has been renovated and furnished to a good modern standard, and there is a built-in washing machine, and fitted Western kitchen. Jomtien Complex has a 4th floor communal swimming pool, plus boasts a fitness center, games room and multi storey car parking. The condo is just 50 metres from Jomtien beach and a wide range of water sports, shops, restaurants and bars. Available for rent on a long term 12-month basis with a 2-month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Royal Park Village

descriptions.description: Royal Park Village. A single storey 2 bedroom home in a village just a 5 minute walk away from Jomtien Beach. The village offers easy access in & out of the village directly onto Thappraya or Theprasit Road. Both of these main roads offer lots of shops, European and Thai restaurants, the Colosseum Cabaret Show, Kaan Show and huge weekend market. The property is rented fully furnished and comes with a fitted Euro kitchen, air conditioning, a small landscaped garden and washing machine. Available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: The Orient Resort and Spa

descriptions.description: The Orient. This is a resort style condominium completed and occupied from 2018. The buildings feature a unique style of decoration and exterior which is very chic and modern, plus the central lagoon pool and amazing seating spaces feel truly relaxing! Located approx. 1 kilometre from Jomtien Beach and only a short 100 metre walk from the small high street of shops, markets and restaurants, this building is a very convenient 2-bedroom condo and a great holiday home, or rental investment. Covering a total floor space of 72square metres, this 2 bed, 2 bath layout is practical and spacious. Designed with an open plan living room in the middle, with the 2 bedrooms on either side. There is a long fitted western kitchen against the back wall and double balconies at the front which offer views over the city. Also provided is a washing machine. The Orient Jomtien offers guests full use of the pool and small Jacuzzi, lots of amazing covered spaces to sit around the pool, a large equipped gymnasium, reception and 24-hour security and lots of car parking. Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

titles.title: The Sanctuary

descriptions.description: The Sanctuary Wongamat Beach. This low-rise development located directly on the Wongamat beach exudes class and luxury. Next door you have the famous Sanctuary of Truth, which is popular postcode in Pattaya. Wongamat Beach, being on the best beaches out of all of your local beachside destinations. this beautiful location has stunning views and 5 star facilities. The large balcony is a nice place to chill out and offers Pattaya City views. The unit is quite unique in the fact that it has 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms with a 125 sqm of living area. The Sanctuary Wongamat itself is set in superb tropical gardens with a multiple pools, swimming pools, Jacuzzi and fitness center with sauna and steam rooms. There is 24 hour security on site and secure underground parking. Owned in Foreign name, the seller is also agreeable in splitting any tax, and transfer fees equally between themselves, and new buyer. Contact your local Cornerstone Real Estate team for more information or help on this must be seen property. You can reach us on email at info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250

titles.title: Laguna Heights

descriptions.description: Laguna Heights. Standing close to the Wongamat Beach in the Northern area of Pattaya City is this modern style low-rise condominium. For beach lovers this could be the perfect place! Wongamat Beach is famous for its clean sandy beachfront which stretches for 1.2 kilometre shoreline with stunning views of the Koh Larn island on the shimmering horizon and the full view of the Pattaya Metropolis. Laguna Heights is an 8 storey condominium with a sea-view rooftop swimming pool. There is also a fitness center, reception & underground car parking for all residents and guests. This 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom property is positioned on the 6th floor of the building and offers sea views from its large balcony. It is possible to slide all of the patio doors separating the living room & balcony to one side, so that the whole apartment feels outside. The fitted Western kitchen is long with practical worktop space, and built in appliances, plus each bathroom has a hot water rain shower. There are 2 well proportioned bedrooms, and the master bedroom enjoys the same 6th floor views of the sea, plus an en-suite bathroom. It is available to buy in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with any property taxes and transfer fees split on a 50/50 basis. Also available for rent on a long term 12-month basis with a 2-month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th

The design incorporates a sliding wall which will open up the master bedroom and master bedroom so that the property feels like a luxury suite. The views are very impressive from here, with nice sea and coastline views by day, plus the illuminated beaches by night. With a 148sqm living space, the property has generous rooms. Tucked into one corner is the fully equipped Western kitchen that is open plan with the living room. The master bedroom has a nice en-suite bathroom with a separate bathtub right beside a window which offers views down the coastline. The guest bedroom has access to the guest bathroom via a 2nd door entry. Through, the whole property will come fully furnished and air conditioned. The Residence at Dream Pattaya has a large poolside gymnasium, a communal swimming pool, multi storey car park and direct beach access. To the side of this condominium is a new built Veranda hotel which has a beachfront restaurant open to all, and there is a private pathway to it. This is a perfect long-term rental property and “it can be yours” with a 12-month rental contract and a 2-month security deposit. Call to arrange a viewing. +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th

This land has been cleared and leveled already so offers a strong stable base for anyone wishing to build straight away. The 1 Rai & 10 wah² is equal to 1,640sqm. There are easy connections to electricity and many homes in the area have made their own deep water well for a free water supply. Located on the 7th floor with city views The development features 526 individual units, including studio, one bedroom and two bedroom condos, ranging from 25 square metres for studio, 35 square metres for one bedroom 70 square metres for two bedroom units. An expansive swimming pool area encompasses a children’s pool, gazebos, pool bar and huge pool Jacuzzi, as well as ample sundecks and a spa. Its verdant gardens are fitted with soothing water features, and its rich architecture offer a sense of genteel sophistication. Similarly, every unit exudes an ambiance of understated luxury, with eye-pleasing colours, well-appointed furnishings and quality fittings. Buyers who require a hassle-free moving experience can be safe in the knowledge that each unit comes fully furnished. The project is jointly developed by Matrix Developments Group and Nova Group, the two leaders in Thailand’s Eastern Seaboard real estate market. The Orient is suitable as an expatriate holiday or retirement home. It is also ideal for first time investors, with on-site rental and resale management services to look after owners’ interests. All 165 units with absolute panorama ocean view of the Pattaya Bay and giving their owners possession of great relaxation and privacy. All our luxury condominiums are ready to transfer and move in. Dream Residences is simply the splendid home and holiday destination for everyone The Residences at Dream has been developed on 10 Rai (16,000sq.m) of absolute beachfront land. The condominium offers 165 of luxury units, covers over 36th floor including The Penthouse. Each floor have Five luxury rooms over looking ocean view. Modern and elegantly designed facilities that include restaurants, health spa, multi-level sea-side pools plus an exclusive beach club all contribute to a unique beachfront investment experience. Dream Hotel group will manage the resort with renowned excellent service. Available for long term rental for 12 month and above. Call your friendly Cornerstone Real Estate team on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details.

titles.title: The Residences @ Dream Pattaya

descriptions.description: The Residence at Dream Pattaya. This high-rise beachfront condo is located at the quieter Southern end of Jomtien Beach. The building has a lovely communal swimming pool and poolside gymnasium, multi storey covered car parking and direct beach access. From here it is only a few hundred metres to a good choice of Western, Thai & Seafood restaurants, mini-marts, and the main Jomtien Beach Road. This area is growing quickly and there are new beachfront condominiums and hotels being completed in the area. This is bringing with it some fantastic beachfront restaurants that offer walk-in guests an amazing seafront experience. With a total of 148sqm, this 2-bedroom home offers a really spacious living area and sea view balcony, a wraparound fully fitted European kitchen, built-in wardrobes and a Jacuzzi tub installed on the balcony. Both of the bedrooms are very generous in size and each has access to an en-suite bathroom. Available for rent fully furnished with a minimum contract period of 12 months, plus a 2-month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details

titles.title: The Trust Central Pattaya

descriptions.description: The Trust Central Pattaya is located off Soi Yume which is behind Big C Extra Pattaya Klang. This lovely 1-bedroom condo for sale great excellent value for money and can be found in the modern “The Trust Central Pattaya” condominium complex. The property will come fully furnished whilst the condo has some great communal features including with large swimming pool, gym, garden area and covered parking. The property also has 24-hour manned security with CCTV throughout the building. Contact a member of Cornerstone friendly team to you learn more about this great value condo. For more information, please email us on info@cornerstone.co.th or call us 038 411250

titles.title: Sefton Park

descriptions.description: Sefton Park. A secure family friendly village which is located close to the Mabprachan Lake in East Pattaya. This is a desirable area for many foreign ExPat families because it offers quick and easy motorway and highway routes to a choice of International Schools, and the Eastern Seaboard & other surrounding industrial areas. It is also possible to access Pattaya City via a choice of roads, however many residents find that almost everything they need is right here on their doorstep in East Pattaya. This area now has a wide selection of top-quality family friendly restaurants and pubs, fresh markets, banks, hardware stores, beauty salons & hairdressers and much, much more. This Thai Bali design offers a nice bright home with the emphasis on access to the front courtyard and private pool area. The stylish property has a 3-bedroom 3-bathroom layout and will be rented fully furnished. There is a separate European kitchen and laundry area plus a maid room with bathroom. The house can be rented with a minimum 12-month contract and a 2-month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Temple Court

descriptions.description: Temple Court Villas is a private estate which is located in the Chak Nok area of East Pattaya. This up and coming area. You can easily get to the Mabprachan lake area and also Jomtien both within 15 minutes. This large 4 bedroom house, with huge private swimming pool, comes fully furnished with large European Kitchen, has air conditioning throughout the property, covered parking and maids quarters. For sale or for long term rental of 12 months, inclusive of pool and garden maintenance. The property is owned in Thai name and the land office transfer fees will be split 50/50 between buyer and seller. For more information, please email us on info@cornerstone.co.th or call us on 038-411250

titles.title: T.W Place

descriptions.description: TW Place. This is a 2 storey 3-bedroom home set with a city centre village. From here is provides easy access into all areas of Pattaya city, plus a quick route to the Sukhumvit Road and the main highways and motorways. Set on 296 sq. metre of land this house has a small front garden, and a garden side covered terrace. All of the downstairs space is for the family sized living room, Western kitchen with high & low cabinets and built in oven and a guest bathroom. On the upper floor are all of the 3 bedrooms. Each bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and the front master bedroom has access onto a large balcony. There is a communal swimming pool inside the village for all residents. It is possible to rent this home on a 1 year basis with a 2 month security deposit. For anyone wishing to purchase this city centre property, it is owned currently in Company Name. If a buyer will take over the company the costs are very cheap. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to check availability - Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: T.W Place

descriptions.description: T.W Place. This village is located between South & Central Pattaya and provides all residents with 24-hour security, plus a communal swimming pool. There is easy access throughout Pattaya City plus a connection to Sukhumvit Road. This is a 4 bedroom 2 storey house which has nice decoration and a practical paved front garden. Inside, all the rooms are clean and bright and air conditioned. To the rear of the home is a large fitted kitchen with built in oven. From the upstairs master bedroom there is a terrace, and to the side of the house is a big covered seating area with another smaller kitchen. The house can be rented with a minimum 12-month contract and a 2-month security deposit. Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

titles.title: T.W Place

descriptions.description: T.W Place. A lovely large 4-bedroom home with a great landscaped garden, located in a Central Pattaya village. Just minutes from the Big C Extra supermarket and with access all around the city. T.W Place has a communal swimming pool and 24-hour security. This 2 storey home offers a 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom layout and will make a great family home. There is plenty of space for even the largest of families. The ground floor provides an open living room, dining room and wrap around European kitchen. Upstairs are the bedrooms and huge upper terrace which has been extended above the covered parking area. T.W Place is close to many Thai schools, and the choice of International schools are within 20 minutes of here. The whole house is well furnished and it is possible to park up to 4 cars if necessary. This home can be rented with a minimum 12-month contract and a 2-month security deposit. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.
